Arwa Abouon (1982-2020) bụ onye na-ese foto na Libya na Canada.
A mụrụ Abouon na Tripoli, Libya na 1982 ma bụrụkwa onye Amazigh. Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Canada n'afọ 1983 na nzaghachi maka iwebata ụmụ okorobịa site na ọchịchị Muammar Gaddafi
Nna ya, Mustafa Muhammad Abouon (1940), tụrụ egwu maka nchekwa nke ụmụ ya.

Abouon gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Concordia dị na Montreal, Quebec, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nka wee nweta nzere bachelọ nke nka mara mma, n'afọ 2007. Ọrụ ya na-adabere n'ahụmahụ ya dị ka nwanyị Alakụba bi na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ ma ọ na-ejikarị omenala ọdịnala Alakụba, uwe na ihe oyiyi n'akụkụ akara nke ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ. Ọ na-akọwa na ebumnuche nke ọrụ ya "bụ ịkpụpụta ekele dị mma maka ọdịbendị Alakụba site n'ịgbanwe uche site na okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gaa na ememe abụ nke ntọala okwukwe

E gosipụtara ọrụ Abouon na mba ụwa na ebe ngosi dị na Canada, United States, Europe, Asia, na Middle East. Diptych ya Mirror Mirror, Allah Allah meriri ihe nrite nke abụọ na ememe nke ịrị abụọ na isii nke Alexandra Biennale for Mediterranean Countries Award na 2014. Onye na-enyocha nka bụ Valerie Behiery kwuru na mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ, nke na-egosi ngosipụta nke Abouon yi uwe mkpuchi na-enweghị, na-enye nkọwa na "ịdị mfe na ọchị". Ọ nwụrụ na Montreal na June 9, 2020.
